name: Nutritious snacks
description: Keep a variety of nutritious snack foods around. Try to snack on something every hour, such as cheese and crackers, muffins, or trail mix.

name: Milkshake
description: Try to eat regularly, even if it is only a few bites. Or, include a nutrition supplement or milkshake.

name: Soup
description: Add grated cheese to soups, sauces, casseroles, vegetables, mashed potatoes, rice, noodles, or meat loaf.

name: Peanut butter
description: Spread peanut butter on bread products or use it as a dip for raw vegetables and fruit. Add peanut butter to sauces or use on waffles.

name: Skim Milk
description: Skim milk powder adds protein. Try adding 2 tablespoons (8.5 grams) of dry skim milk powder in addition to the amount of regular milk in recipes.

name: Vegetables
description: Eat lots of vegetables. Include all shades of green at least once everyday.

name: Egg
description: Add coarsely chopped hard cooked egg and cheese cubes to a tossed salad.

name: Meat
description: Add grated cheeses, tuna, shrimp, crabmeat, ground beef, diced ham or sliced boiled eggs to sauces, rice, casseroles, and noodles.
